data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Formerly KGS::GoBoard (and possibly the first Gtk2 widget
    implemented in perl), I decided to unbundle it (at least in the
    namespace) from it, since it's far too generic to be used just for
    this one application. Also, perl shouldn't be without a
    hq-go-widget.
